content.question: <math alttext="x " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> 1 3 2 4 3 7 4 8 5 12 The table shows several values of <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and their corresponding values of <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following is closest to the correlation between <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>?

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Calculate summary statistics, relative positions of points within a distribution, correlation, and predicted response.
